page.title: 10A RETIRED MINER TALKS TO US.
page.content: Mr. Wilkinson, who was a miner from the age of fourteen, came to talk to us about mining. He showed us a map of the underground mines and it showed us that the whole of our area is built over coal mines. Although Clock Face coal mine has closed down there are two coal mines just outside our block and within walking distance of our school. Many of our fathers work in the coal mines. Mr. Wilkinson told us the history of mining and how it has changed over the years. He used to work with pit-ponies, but they don't use them now. Today there are better safety standards. He showedus the filters which tell how much coal dust is in the area and also slides of machines which pumps water into the mines to clear the dust.These machines are big and have to be built underground.
